nodes.text: Lona Aphra was a female human and the mother of Chelli Aphra. She gave birth to her daughter in 24 BBY. Lona split with Chelli's father Korin Aphra, taking Chelli to live on Arbiflux until raiders attacked their home. Lona was shot and crawled into the forest as Chelli ran, but the girl returned with a blaster found in a cave, and fired back at the raiders until Imperial scout troopers surrounded her.
